column4: what does "the debootstrap program exited with an error (return value  1)" mean?
depends on when it did, install?

is it during a normal install the "target" is nothin if it was during a debootstrap to get 32 bits to run under a 64 bits enviromnent it is where you debottstrapteed 'em, so again, when does this problem appear?
